summary: To do a possible script for make all shield when shated on back!
descriptionHtml:
When CK comes aout I will start duin  mods for this comunity i will be perfered in hause abadoes mods and iterior decoration,but first i like to start with  Mod Shield on Back bicase is Skyrim so much more modable then oblivion and if someone can help me with that request it will be pleasure.
